channel.title: CVE Feed for Google -- Gvisor

item.title: CVE-2023-7258|2024-05-24T10:35:13.978Z -- Google -- Gvisor
item.description: A denial of service exists in Gvisor Sandbox where a bug in reference counting code in mount point tracking could lead to a panic, making it possible for an attacker running as root and with permission to mount volumes to kill the sandbox. We recommend upgrading past commitÂ 6a112c60a257dadac59962e0bc9e9b5aee70b5b6
